body:
Basic settings are introduced in [Getting started](/getting-started) page. This posts is about other configurations that you may need. New settings will be updated here.

Let's say your website is at `https://your-website-name.netlify.app`, go to `https://your-website-name.netlify.app/admin` and log in with your admin account.
Then navigate to `Collections > Settings`. This will show a list of your blog settings.

--- 

## Table of Contents

[toc]

## General

- `WEBSITE_NAME`: your blog name
- `JUMBOTRON`: a large image on the top of the home page
- `LOGO`: your blog logo
- `AUTHOR_NAME`: your name here
- `AUTHOR_AVATAR`: your avatar
- `DESCRIPTION`: some words describe your blog

## Social sharing

Toggle each option to display share button for that network at the bottom of pages/posts

## Navigation bar

Allow to change navigation bar layout

- `Display page list first`: By default, from left to right, there should be categories from then pages. Turn on this option to display page list before category list.
- `Categories`: Configurations for showing category list in navigation bar
    - `List`: Arrange categories by your favourite order. If this list is empty, all categories will be displayed despite of other settings.
    - `Display selected only`: Only show selected categories from above `List`. Default value is `OFF` which means, non-selected categories will be appended to your list with alphabet order.
- `Pages`: Configurations for showing page list in navigation bar.
    - `List`: Arrange pages by your favourite order. If this list is empty, all pages will be displayed despite of other settings.
    - `Display selected only`: Only show selected pages from above `List`. Default value is `OFF` which means, non-selected pages will be appended to your list with alphabet order.
::: info
`Index` page will be excluded.
:::
